attributes.action: For the government to subsidise electric cars, making them more affordable
attributes.additional_details: How can this be achieved without the masses taking action? A good start is shifting our transport network to using energy from a more renewable source.
attributes.background: The carbon footprint of the average UK person per year is 13 tonnes. A big proportion of this is through transport,  by 2030 carbon emissions need to be Halved to ensure temperatures don’t rise above 2 degrees.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
The Government already provides a grant towards the costs of some low emission vehicles: https://www.gov.uk/plug-in-car-van-grants

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what else you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
